ComicInfo.Summary:
Trapped in the Rumpus Room!
Detective Hernandez is trapped in billionaire Bob Schrunk's basement prison known as the "Rumpus Room" - and while she's stuck there, she's going to get to know her fellow inmates and learn how they had wronged Schrunk and earned their fate. Meanwhile, Schrunk is losing control of his tech company and must consolidate his position with the board of directors. Plus, what's the secret of the billionaire's collection of bizarre art?
Eisner Award-winning writer Mark Russell (NOT ALL ROBOTS) and artist Ramon Rosanas (YEAR ZERO) deliver a groundbreaking and exciting new title!
Tagged with the ninjas.walk.alone fork of ComicTagger 1.3.5 using info from Comic Vine on 2024-01-29 03:22:49. [Issue ID 1026080]
